snippet.title: Magfest Sizzle Reel | Battle Gem Ponies (MIVS)
snippet.description:
Play the Latest Demo: https://linktr.ee/YotesMark
And subscribe to keep up with the game's development!

Here's a 30 second showcase of the gameplay in the Ultra Demo. A combination of previous sizzle reels and trailer footage to give a quick impression of what this game's all about.

Good ol' skool Stat Crunchin', Pony Blastin', Route Explorin' action!

Keep an eye out for us on the MIVS 2023 show floor at Magfest, Jan 5th-8th. We'll be there with a brand new demo showing off what we've been cooking up in Q4 2022.
